requests.name: Create Payment
requests.description:
Create a stored credit card, direct credit card, or PayPal account. 

Ref: https://developer.paypal.com/webapps/developer/docs/api/#create-a-payment
requests.headers:
Accept: application/json
Accept-Language: en_US
Content-Type: application/json
Authorization: Bearer <YOUR CREDENTIALS HERE>

requests.name: Get List of Payments
requests.description:
Get a list of all the payments tied to the account credentials used to make the API calls.

Ref: https://developer.paypal.com/webapps/developer/docs/api/#list-payment-resources
requests.headers:
Accept: application/json
Accept-Language: en_US
Content-Type: application/json
Authorization: Bearer <YOUR CREDENTIALS HERE>

requests.name: Look Up Payment Resource
requests.description:
Using the ID of the payment, find out all the details about it.

Ref: https://developer.paypal.com/webapps/developer/docs/api/#look-up-a-payment-resource
requests.headers:
Accept: application/json
Accept-Language: en_US
Content-Type: application/json
Authorization: Bearer <YOUR CREDENTIALS HERE>

requests.name: Execute Approved Payment
requests.description:
Execute a payment that was previously approved by a buyer.

Ref: https://developer.paypal.com/webapps/developer/docs/api/#execute-an-approved-paypal-payment
requests.headers:
Accept: application/json
Accept-Language: en_US
Content-Type: application/json
Authorization: Bearer <YOUR CREDENTIALS HERE>
requests.data: { "payer_id" : "<ID OF THE PAYER WHO AUTHORIZED THE PAYMENT TO YOUR APP HERE>" }
